ILP is currency agnostic. You can send Monero to somebody who wants Bitcoin without ever touching $ XRP. ILP creates a level playing field where all digital assets can compete on their own merit. You can even send payments using legacy systems.
The need for fiat Ripple gateways, is probably more accurate.
Interledger (ILP) can perform transactions across different blockchains and even legacy systems. It negates the need for Ripple gateways.
You have to be a member of RippleNet to access xRapid (which is in limited beta, I believe).
